description:

What If Episode 3 is an alternate take on “Fury’s Big Week.” This is the Avengers prelude comic that detailed the events leading up to the Avengers; established a Marvel timeline, and revealed that the events of Iron man 2, The Incredible Hulk, Thor, and Captain America: First Avenger’s ending all happened in the same week.

This episode features Hank Pym dismantling the Avengers (which probably proves that the Strongest Avenger is Scott Lang, right?). This delightful rampage through Phase One has massive repercussions, as Loki conquers Earth and Fury is forced to use his Captain Marvel pager a bit early.
